name: ax-mulass
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2))))
comment: Multiplication of complex numbers is associative. Axiom 10 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axmulass . Proofs should normally use ~ mulass instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
